FuncDef:
The ipv4-family multicast command displays the BGP-IPv4 multicast address family view.
The undo ipv4-family multicast command deletes the configurations in the BGP-IPv4 multicast address family view.
By default, the BGP-IPv4 unicast address family view is displayed.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If the undo ipv4-family multicast command is run, all configurations in the BGP-IPv4 multicast address family view will be deleted.
